text:
This place is amazing.  Very kind staff, delicious food, BYO, and the meals are all inexpensive - especially compared to any other restaurant in the area.

The menu is not overly extensive and offers a variety of styles of Asian delights.  The sushi is top notch, the Thai and Chinese dishes on offer are also delicious.  I have found a few 'go-to' plates here that I have almost every time and they are consistently tasty.  Portions are ample and again, the price is right - doubly so if you consider that it is a BYO.

In the Summer you can sit outside on a small deck area and enjoy the weather while eating.  The interior of the restaurant is vibrant , clean and perhaps just a bit too busy in terms of decor, but the large fish tank and it's beautiful inhabitants make up for any of that.  They do tend to play music that is either a little too dance/spa for my tastes, but they keep the volume low enough that it doesn't matter.  And heck, who doesn't like nodding their head to the beat while chowing down on a tasty plate of pad thai now and then.  

They offer a decent amount of vegetarian options as well, and the desserts look quite tasty though I haven't tried one yet.

If you are nearby you definitely need to try this out as it is, to my mind, the best option in the area.  It is open for lunch service and again for dinner.
Excellent restaurant asiatique, bon service, nourriture succulente. Bon prix aussi. Je le recommande!

Je ne compte plus le nombre de fois que je suis allé à ce restaurant, mais à chaque fois, c'est agréable de s'y retrouver. L'ambiance est détendu avec un fond de musique asiatique aux instruments traditionnels. Le service est rapide, ce qui fait en sorte que nos repas sont chaud une fois à notre table. Le personnel est souriant et très courtois. La nourriture est de bonne qualité. Je recommande la soupe Tom Yum au poulet (piquante et douce à la fois), les calamars fris (frais et bien assaisonnés), les Won Ton fris (croquants ), le poulet général Tao ( croustillant et tendre en même temps), le boeuf aux sésames et j'en passe. Le rapport qualité prix est excellent, surtout leur table d'hôte. Malheureusement, bien peu de gens semble le visiter à ce temps ci de l'année, mais l'ensemble des qualités de ce restaurant demeure. Je recommande ce restaurant aux amateurs de cuisines asiatiques.

Une bonne ambiance, prix raisonnable, bon service, nourriture de qualité et portion généreuse. Se compare à ce qui se trouve dans le quartier Chinois. Pour les amateurs de cuisine asiatiques (à la Nord-Américaine). Ce restaurant mérite plus d'une visite.
